prompts: Create a snowy Pokemon that is part ice and part grass, with a rugged look.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in cold environments, featuring a unique mountain shape.
Design a Pokemon with green and white colors, inspired by winter landscapes and frost.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a snow-covered mountain with icy claws.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a snowman, but with natural features and a fierce personality.
Generate a Pokemon that has a fluffy snow-like appearance and lives in forested regions.
Make a Pokemon that blends seamlessly into icy terrains, with striking teal accents.
